mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation menu responsiveness to enhance user experience on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce the number of high-size resources to improve page loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more targeted keywords in headings and metadata for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure consistency in call-to-action buttons across different sections to improve navigation.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking form process by reducing unnecessary steps to enhance user flow.
